extendedInfo.description: The leader in news, local content and digital media in Puerto Rico is available on the Android for free.The application you need to stay informed of the latest news and entertainment information, while on the go. All the information you need in just a click away, with the most complete coverage of Puerto Rico and world news. Receive breaking news alerts with our push notifications. Share the news with your friends via e-mail, Facebook and Twitter.Be the reporter. The El Nuevo Dia Android Application allows you to share news that you witness with the editorial team of El Nuevo Dia and elnuevodia.com. You only need to access the Caza Noticias section and enable the camera feature of your phone.You will also have access to local movie listings, local lottery numbers and the most complete database of restaurants in Puerto Rico.Sections:Noticias/NewsThe most complete news coverage of Puerto Rico, World, Business, Entertainment, Sports, LifeStyles, Lottery, and user generated news. Share the news with your friends via e-mail, Facebook and/or TwitterCaza NoticiasCapture. Send. Report. If you witness any event that is news, send it to El Nuevo Dia. Use a picture from your picture gallery or take a picture using your Androidâs camera and easily send it to the editorial team of El Nuevo Dia and elnuevodia.com.Cartelera/MoviesThe only local application with the complete movie listings for Puerto Rico. Find theaters close to your location (via GPS). Get theaterâs information (address, phone number and map their location). Set favorites theaters. Find listings by locations or by movies. Watch trailers of your favorite movies.Sal.prAccess the most complete database of restaurants in Puerto Rico. Search by location, type of food, ambience and budget. Choose the option you want. Download the Sal Android Application or access the Sal Mobile Web site.HorÃ³scopo/HoroscopeFeel the urge to check your horoscope before hitting the road? Find your daily horoscope, get your lucky numbers, set your sign or even get a peek at tomorrowâs horoscope.Clima/WeatherFind updated weather information for your location or change the location manually. Get the current weather, 4 days forecast, radar and satellite information. Fotos/PhotosHave access to different photo galleries of each news section.VideosView news through our videos available for each news section

reviews.title: Cambio para l vocero

reviews.title: La da\303\261aron
reviews.comment: Con el supuesto upgrade que le dieron, ahora las noticias no se ven. Hay que abrir y cerrar el app varias veces hasta que aparezcan. Favor arreglenlo ya!!!

reviews.title: No sirve
reviews.comment: La version anterior funcionaba bien. Esta nueva version es una porqueria, las noticias nunca suben. Si algo no esta roto no lo arregles.

reviews.title: era bueno
reviews.comment: ahora las noticias no salen....q pasa no hechen para atras esta muy buena aplicacion.!!!!!

reviews.comment: Buen periodico

reviews.title: Desastroso update
reviews.comment: El ultimo update es un desastre. La aplicacion funcionaba muy bien antes, ahora tarda muchisimo en bajar la info y no se pueden ver las noticias porque no abren. Hagan algo prontoooo!!!!

reviews.comment: Isntalo el app en mi android hoy y manana cuando lo enciendo se desinstala sola y hay q reinstalar la app cada vez q apago el cel. Breguen con eso...\teso...

reviews.title: bochinche
reviews.comment: fui a casa de mi  tia a visitarla la encontre con mi otro primo metiendo mano !! y lo bien que se veian los condenas!

reviews.title: Bueeenooo...los anuncios.. .
reviews.comment: Nunca he tenido problemas con este app, todo funciona bien. Me aparece un anuncio...lo borro y sigo mi camino.
